item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, May 4, 2025 at 9:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. What went wrong with wireless USB (182 points | 60 comments)
2. Gorgeous-GRUB: collection of decent community-made GRUB themes (238 points | 52 comments)
3. Show HN: Free, in-browser PDF editor (496 points | 107 comments)
4. Switch bouncing reference traces for a variety of different switches (11 points | 2 comments)
5. DuckDB is probably the most important geospatial software of the last decade (286 points | 83 comments)
6. Pascal for Small Machines (62 points | 6 comments)
7. Metagenomics test saves woman's sight after mystery infection (103 points | 35 comments)
8. I built a pixel art editor after playing Octopath Traveler II (54 points | 18 comments)
9. Elvish – Powerful scripting language and versatile interactive shell (19 points | 8 comments)
10. Legendary Bose Magic Carpet Suspension Is Finally Going Global (156 points | 101 comments)
11. Brian Eno's Theory of Democracy (70 points | 34 comments)
12. Programmers Guide to the AMIBIOS (1993) [pdf] (49 points | 10 comments)
13. Time saved by AI offset by new work created, study suggests (331 points | 309 comments)
14. A Survey of AI Agent Protocols (53 points | 26 comments)
15. Why can't HTML alone do includes? (297 points | 246 comments)
16. Numerical Linear Algebra Class in Julia TUM (96 points | 4 comments)

18. Britain's Latest True Crime Thriller: Who Killed the Sycamore Tree? (10 points | 9 comments)
19. A PostgreSQL planner semi-join gotcha with CTE, LIMIT, and RETURNING (41 points | 26 comments)
20. When flat rate movers won't answer your calls (227 points | 150 comments)
21. DotnetSnes: Library allowing to use C# to create SNES ROMs (28 points | 3 comments)
22. Why I Am Not Going to Buy a Computer (1987) [pdf] (84 points | 47 comments)
23. QModem 4.51 Source Code (188 points | 70 comments)
24. We fell out of love with Next.js and back in love with Ruby on Rails (357 points | 319 comments)
25. Google Gemini has the worst LLM API (88 points | 80 comments)
26. A simple Common Lisp web app (33 points | 8 comments)
27. Run LLMs on Apple Neural Engine (ANE) (252 points | 103 comments)
28. Helpcare AI (YC F24) Is Hiring ( | hide)
29. Minimum Viable Blog (320 points | 157 comments)
30. Why I stopped angel investing after 15 years (and what I'm doing instead) (190 points | 159 comments)
